level.text: The facility shall develop, conspicuously post in the facility, and follow a written plan of basic daily routines, tasks and work assignments for residents which are consistent with the resident’s age and level of development.
Whenever practicable, residents shall participate in planning daily routines, tasks and work assignments.
Daily routines, tasks and work assignments shall be consistent with each resident’s age and level of development.
Daily routines, tasks, and work assignments shall not conflict with a resident’s ISP or serve as a substitute for sufficient facility staff.
The facility shall make the plan of basic daily routines, tasks and work assignments for residents available to all residents and staff.
